snippet: Republicans investigating the possible targeting of Tea Party groups ridiculed reports of computer crashes.
abstract: Investigators announce that six additional Internal Revenue Service workers lost emails sought by congressional investigators when their computers crashed, escalating Republican suspicions that the employees may have been trying to cover up political targeting of Tea Party organizations.
lead_paragraph: Republicans investigating the possible targeting of Tea Party groups ridiculed reports of computer crashes.

headline.main: Lawmakers Skeptical on Emails and I.R.S.
headline.print_headline: Lawmakers Skeptical on Emails and I.R.S.

keywords.value: House Oversight and Government Reform Committee
keywords.name: organizations
